name: 蔡瑞吉
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Textbook: Quest 1 Second Edition By Hartmann & Blass
First Semester
1 to 9 weeks Chapter 1 Career Planning
10 to 18 weeks Chapter 2 The Free Enterprise System
Chapter 3  Animal Behavior
Second Semester
1 to 9 weeks Chapter 4 Nutrition
10 to 18 weeks Chapter 5 From Settlement to Independence
Chapter 6 A Changing Nation
scorePolicy:
